age.title: Ya≈ü
age.notes: Age - Free-form input, LLM read-write. IMPORTANT: Input may be textual like 'twenty' or 'I am about to be twenty one' - extract numeric value (20) and save as integer. Handle variations like 'I'm 25', 'twenty-five', 'around 30', etc.

height.title: Boy
height.notes: Height in cm - Free-form input, LLM read-write. IMPORTANT: Input may be textual like 'one seventy five' or 'I am about 180cm tall' - extract numeric value (175, 180) and save as integer. Handle variations like '5 feet 8 inches' (convert to cm), 'around 170', etc.

weight.title: Kilo
weight.notes: Weight in kg - Free-form input, LLM read-write. IMPORTANT: Input may be textual like 'seventy kilos' or 'I weigh about 65' - extract numeric value (70, 65) and save as integer. Handle variations like '150 pounds' (convert to kg), 'around 75kg', etc.
